description: This table contains the audit trail and history of the event record.

columns.name: EVENT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the event record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the information associated with this event. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: EVENT_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the original recorded event. Together with the EVENT_ID column, this forms the foreign key to ED_IEV_EVENT_INFO.

columns.name: EVENT_EDITED_TIME
columns.description: The date and time when the event was edited.

columns.name: EVNT_DISP_NAME_AUD
columns.description: The display name of the edited event.

columns.name: EVENT_AUDIT_TIME
columns.description: The date and time when this edited event occurred.

columns.name: EVT_REC_AUDIT_TIME
columns.description: The date and time when this edited event was recorded.

columns.name: EVT_AUDIT_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who created this edited event.

columns.name: EVT_EDITED_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who edited this event. This user might not be the user who initially created this edited event.

columns.name: EVENT_CMT_AUDIT
columns.description: The comments associated with this edited event.

columns.name: STAFFED_BEDS_AUDIT
columns.description: The number of staffed beds for a department at the time of the edited event. This item is only populated if you are using the Staffed Beds activity.

columns.name: EVENT_AUDIT_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the provider who is associated with this edited event. For example, a deleted or updated Assign Attending event stores the provider who was assigned in this column. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_SER table.

columns.name: EVENT_STAT_AUDIT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number of the status of the edited event.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active


Inactive


Deleted


Inactive and Deleted


Hidden


Inactive and Hidden


Deleted and Hidden


Inactive Deleted and Hidden

columns.name: EVENT_INI_REC_ID_A
columns.description: The master file and ID of the source of a edited duplicate procedure alert event. For example, this item usually holds LDG-ID (the ID of the procedure duplicate group used) or EAP-ID (the ID of the procedure used).

columns.name: EVENT_CONTEXT_AUDIT
columns.description: For some edited events, this column holds the context of the edited event. Lab Ordered events might store the order ID here. Duplicate procedure alert events might store information on specific user actions in response to the alert.

columns.name: EVENT_NOTECSN_AUDIT
columns.description: The event note contact serial number (CSN) of the event that was edited. This can be used to determine the note content at each edit.

columns.name: EVENT_AUDIT_DEPT_ID
columns.description: Audit trail for the item that stores what department an event occurred in.

columns.name: ED_C_CLIENT_SRC_A_C_NAME
columns.description:
The audit trail for where the ED Course comment was filed from.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Hyperspace


Limerick


Haiku


Canto
